setupScript.name: setFocusOnSpinButtonAndSetPredefinedDate
setupScript.description: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, and sets focus on the 'Day' spin button

user: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'eighteenth'.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'eighteenth'.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
